description: authorize an org using the JWT flow
examples: sfdx auth:jwt:grant -u me@my.org -f <path to jwt key file> -i <OAuth client id>
sfdx auth:jwt:grant -u me@my.org -f <path to jwt key file> -i <OAuth client id> -s -a MyDefaultOrg
sfdx auth:jwt:grant -u me@acme.org -f <path to jwt key file> -i <OAuth client id> -r https://acme.my.salesforce.com
key: path to a file containing the private key
JwtGrantError: We encountered a JSON web token error, which is likely not an issue with Salesforce CLI. Hereâ€™s the error: %s
